mapper.select: SELECT task.*, task_item.custom_data AS custom_data, task_item.details AS details, task_item.rule_id AS rule_id, task_item.create_time AS task_item_create_time FROM task JOIN task_item ON task.id = task_item.task_id WHERE task.id = #{taskId} limit 1
SELECT task.*, COUNT(task_item_resource.resource_id) as count FROM task LEFT JOIN task_item_resource ON task_item_resource.task_id = task.id WHERE task.id = #{taskId} GROUP BY task.id

SELECT IFNULL(sum(IFNULL(t3.resources_sum, 0)), 0) FROM task t LEFT JOIN task_item t1 ON t.id = t1.task_id LEFT JOIN task_item_resource t2 ON t1.id = t2.task_item_id LEFT JOIN resource t3 ON t2.resource_id = t3.id WHERE t.id = #{taskId}

SELECT IFNULL(sum(IFNULL(t3.return_sum, 0)), 0) FROM task t LEFT JOIN task_item t1 ON t.id = t1.task_id LEFT JOIN task_item_resource t2 ON t1.id = t2.task_item_id LEFT JOIN resource t3 ON t2.resource_id = t3.id WHERE t.id = #{taskId}

SELECT t.*, t3.name as account_name FROM task t JOIN message_order_item t1 ON t.id = t1.task_id JOIN message_order t2 ON t1.message_order_id = t2.id JOIN cloud_account t3 ON t2.account_id = t3.id WHERE t2.id = #{id} ORDER BY t.return_sum DESC
SELECT IFNULL(sum(IFNULL(t.return_sum, 0)), 0) FROM task t JOIN message_order_item t1 ON t.id = t1.task_id JOIN message_order t2 ON t1.message_order_id = t2.id WHERE t2.id = #{id}
SELECT IFNULL(sum(IFNULL(t.resources_sum, 0)), 0) FROM task t JOIN message_order_item t1 ON t.id = t1.task_id JOIN message_order t2 ON t1.message_order_id = t2.id WHERE t2.id = #{id}
